REcopol 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    Diversity

    Functions for estimation diversity

    diversity_estimate()

    Estimate diversity for community data

    diversity_estimate_taxonomic()

    Estimate taxonomic diversity using Hill numbers

    diversity_estimate_functional()

    Estimate functional diversity

    diversity_estimate_phylogenetic()

    Estimating phylogenetic diversity

    Ordinations

    Functions to fit Detrended (Canonical) Correspondence Analysis

    fit_ordination()

    Fit ordination

    fit_ordination_dca()

    Fit DCA

    fit_ordination_dcca()

    Fit DCCA using CANOCO

    GAM modeling

    Functions to fit, predict, and visualise generalized additive models (GAM) models

    fit_custom_gam()

    Fit custom single term GAM model

    fit_hgam()

    Fit single term hierarchical GAM model

    fit_multiple_gams()

    Fit multiple individual generalized additive models (GAMs)

    predic_model()

    Predict data from a regression model

    plot_temporal_trend()

    Plot temporal trend

    Change-point analyses and regression partition

    Functions for detection of change points in temporal patterns

    regression_partition()

    Partition data using regression tree

    mv_regression_partition()

    Multivariate regression partitioning

    get_change_points()

    Detect change points in a vector

    get_change_points_all()

    Detect change points for all columns

    add_data_partition()

    Add partition of data

    Utility

    Functions for operation with (not only) fossil pollen data

    add_age_bin()

    add age time bin

    transfer_into_proportions()

    Transform pollen data into percentages

    tranform_percentage_data()

    Transform pollen data using selected transformation

    get_density()

    Get density from vector of numbers

    Contents

    Developed by Ondrej Mottl.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
